reviewText: Folks, I saw this first run on HBO and if was money well spent. If you want nightmares about embalming, curses, witches, double crossing thugs. I say get'em, it is worth every cent, seasons one and two starts gets the creepy journey started. Episode by episode you find yourself being taken over by nightmares (of course you may have a stronger stomach than me) Check'em out.
summary: Tales Of The Crypt, A Breath Taking Scary Time

reviewText: I use to love Tales from the Crypt when I was a kid so I bought this, which was for a VERY GOOD price, just to find out that I no longer love/like it enough to spend a dime in any season. I got what I ordered for a great price and I just regret buying because I don't like it. But If you do... I recommend. ;)

reviewText: Classic. This show is just great, both seasons one and two are a perfect example of the genre. Not many shows like this exist today, and this is the King. Season One is really short though! So keep it in mind, its really good, but its only 6 episodes! But its also a necessity! I wish they still made shows like this, we surely need it.

reviewText: This is a must have for any horror fan. First season is rather short but the second season makes up for that. out of the 24 episodes there were only 2 or 3 I didn't like. My only real complaint is that there are too many episodes about someone killing their lover which kinda gets old but still very good.

reviewText: This is one of my favorite retro scary tv series.  I am delighted its on dvd now.  Its a bit  dated with the 1980's style clothing/hair/music but the scripts are still fun to see again.  I recommend this set as its well worth the money for  the set of seasons 1 & 2 for a mere 20 bucks  ( season one is just 6 episodes ) you can't go wrong.  I would rate this for viewing as tv 14 at least with blood/gore/nudity and scare level.  Ages 12 + at least.  I viewed this as age 21 and older and it was very creepy fun for my husband & I on HBO.  I wish the show had consisted of more series.  The price is totally affordable for both seasons so you can't beat that.  Wish packaging was a plastic vs. a paper sheath for collectors of this show like myself.  This is classic creep & I LOVE it.

reviewText: Best horror series ever. I used to watch Tales from the Crypt when I was 12 yrs old. This series used to creep me out. Now its just entertaining lol. I enjoyed these two seasons alot and plan to buy the rest of them and have them as collectables once I have the complete 7 seasons. Would recommend these to any horror fan.
